title: Eden · Email Development Specialist
body: Create monthly email templates ensuring accessibility and usability. Responsibilities included designing templates with HTML, CSS, and MJML, ensuring compatibility with dark/light modes, responsiveness across various devices, and cross-platform optimization.

title: BettaTech · Frontend Developer
body: Lead the development and implementation of user-friendly, responsive UI components. Key responsibilities included creating and optimizing reusable components, ensuring responsive design, integrating webhooks with AWS Lambda for Stripe subscriptions, and collaborating closely with design and backend teams.

title: UI Guideline
body: Standardized UI component nomenclature, aimed to make UI Guideline an essential resource for UI professionals. Key responsibilities included data optimization, responsive design, cross­ browser testing, SEO enhancements, and WCAG-compliant accessibility features.

title: Freelancer · Front-End Developer
body: Specialize in mobile-first web development projects, championing responsive design principles to ensure optimal user experience across various devices. Engage with a spectrum of web development initiatives, with a keen focus on leveraging modern front-end technologies and innovative user interface design. Collaborate with industry professionals, contributing expertise to high-impact projects that deliver cutting-edge and user-centric solutions.

title: TEKRED · Security Equipment Installer
body: Commenced as a security camera installer, rapidly acquiring skills for comprehensive security system management. Enhanced procedural efficiency, optimizing the installation and maintenance of security apparatus.

title: PrintExpress · Junior Graphic Designer
body: Crafted marketing materials, including logos and flyers. Engaged with customers for design satisfaction. Managed the printing process for high-quality outputs.

title: OmegaTech · Computer Repair Technician
body: Handled 10-12 computer repairs daily, later increasing to 25 per day. Improved repair protocols and analytical procedures, boosting productivity.
